contentrichtext.text: '''Mitry - Claye''' is a [[railway station]] near [[Paris]], [[France]]. It is located in the commune of [[Mitry-Mory]], and also serves nearby [[Claye-Souilly]]. It is served by regional [[Transilien]] trains and the Paris [[RER]] trains, and is thus an important transit point. <gallery> File:Gare de Mitry - Claye 01.jpg|Entrance File:Gare de Mitry - Claye 02.jpg| File:Gare-Mitry-Mory-CPancienne.jpg| </gallery> {{s-start}} {{s-rail|title=SNCF}} {{s-line|system=Transilien|line=K|previous=Aulnay-sous-Bois|next=Compans}} {{s-line|system=TER Picardie|line=6|previous=Paris-Nord|next=Dammartin-Juilly-Saint-Mard}} {{s-line|system=RER|line=B|type=B5|type2=both|previous=|next=Villeparisis - Mitry-le-Neuf}} {{s-end}} ==See also== {{commons category|Gare de Mitry - Claye}} * [[List of stations of the Paris RER]] {{coord|48.976|N|2.642|E|display=title|source:nlwiki}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mitry}} [[Category:Paris RER stations]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Seine-et-Marne]] {{IledeFrance-railstation-stub}} {{ParisRER-stub}}
